import pandas as pd
from wordcloud import WordCloud

import matplotlib.pyplot as plt
import seaborn as sns
import calendar

sns.set(style='darkgrid')
plt.rcParams["figure.figsize"] = (18,7)
source.87d07436: df['month'] = df['date'].dt.month df['month_name'] = df['month'].apply(lambda x:calendar.month_abbr[x]) df.drop(['id','url', 'subtitle', 'month'], axis=1, inplace=True) def replacetitle(title): title = title.replace('','') suffix = title.rfind('') title = title[:suffix] return title df['title'] = df['title'].apply(replacetitle)
source.07a3a4eb:
var = [' '" ".join(word for word in df['title'].astype(str))]
var=var[0]
source.2bd88c2c:
wordcloud=WordCloud(width = 2000, height = 1000, 
                background_color ='White', colormap = 'Set2',min_font_size = 20).generate(var)
plt.figure(figsize = (8, 8), facecolor = None)
plt.imshow(wordcloud)
plt.axis("off")
plt.tight_layout(pad = 0)
  
plt.show()
